title: UMUD Dataset Metadata Schema
description: A comprehensive schema for metadata of muscle ultrasound datasets in the UMUD repository.

DATASET_NAME.description: Name of the dataset containing the name and the year separated by an underscore, e.g., 'DeepACSA_2022'.

DOI.description: Optional. Digital Object Identifier (DOI) of the dataset.

VERSION.description: Version of the dataset following semver principles (i.e., 1.0.0).

MUSCLE.description: List of muscles included in the dataset. Choose one or multiple from the available options.

MUSCLE_REGION.description: List of muscle regions (proximal, middle, distal). Choose one or multiple from the available options.

DEVICE.description: Optional. Ultrasound device used to collect the data. Choose one or mulitple from the available options.

TRANSDUCER.description: Optional. Model of the probe used during data collection. Enter one.

DATA_TYPE.description: Type of data in the dataset (Images, Videos, Volumes). Choose one.

FILE_TYPE.description: File type of the data (e.g., jpg, png, mp4). Choose one.

DATA_PLANE.description: Plane in which the images/videos were collected (Transverse, Longitudinal). Choose one.

SCANNING_FREQUENCY.description: Optional. Scanning frequency in MHz (1-100). Select value.

SAMPLING_RATE.description: Optional. Sampling rate or fps (0-1000). Select value.

PARTICIPANT_AGE.description: Optional. Mean age of participants (0-100). Select mean value.

PARTICIPANT_HEIGHT.description: Optional. Mean height of participants in cm (0-220). Select mean value.

PARTICIPANT_WEIGHT.description: Optional. Mean weight of participants in kg (0-200). Select mean value.

PARTICIPANT_SEX.description: Sex of participants (Male, Female, Both). Choose one.

SAMPLE_SIZE.description: Number of participants included in the dataset (minimum 1). Enter n.

DATA_LABELS.description: Whether labels are provided for the data. Select Checkbox.

DATA_LABELS_DESCRIPTION.description: Optional. Description of the labels provided. As detailed as necessary but as short as possible.

SHORT_DESCRIPTION.description: Brief description of the dataset (max 500 characters). As detailed as necessary but as short as possible.

DATASET_YEAR.description: Year the dataset was created (4-digit year).

PUBLICATION_LINK.description: Optional. URL Link to the publication containing the data.

DATASET_LINK.description: Optional. URL Link to the publiccation containing the data.

AUTHORS.description: List of authors of the dataset, separated by commas.

CONTACT.description: List of contact emails of the authors, separated by commas.

LICENSE.description: License under which the data is shared.
